enum _CPScatterPlotInterpolation

Enumeration of scatter plot interpolation algorithms.

Enumerator:
CPScatterPlotInterpolationLinear 

Linear interpolation.

CPScatterPlotInterpolationStepped 

Steps beginnning at data point.

CPScatterPlotInterpolationHistogram 

Steps centered at data point.
